article_title: Hutcheson Medical Center foreclosure halted to give hospital more time to repay debt

article_metadata.description: Hutcheson Medical Center won't go on the auction block next week as one of its competitors and former managers had planned.

og.description: Hutcheson Medical Center won't go on the auction block next week as one of its competitors and former managers had planned.
